full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Architectural Services**

Published on Mo Fri 19 May 2023
Closes on Thu Jul 6 2023. 
Amendment # 5

Government of Canada is seeking responses from qualified bidders for a standing offer (SO) for architectural services across regions of Ontario. The preferred bidders will be called to provide architectural and engineering services to the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada.

(Note: Please disregard the previously published response deadline final submitting deadline time and submission deadline. The requested supporting documentation and submissions must be submitted by this time. Late submissions after this deadline shall be denied June 30th.)

Industry category is 81101508 - Architectural engineering
Unspsc Category: Architectural engineering
Total Estimated Budget: $20,000,000 CAD

The requesting authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC). It anticipates the total value of these standing offers to be approximately $20,000,000 CAD (HST included) and individual call-ups at a maximum value of $ 1,500,000 CAD (HST included).

All candiates must express their interest in a SINGLE PROPOSAL covering service areas of:

    Architectural design and project documentation
    Contract administration and quality control
    Research and feasibility studies
    Development, evaluation and implementation of business processes
    Environmental impact and sustainability analysis
    Project management
    Geotechnical engineering
    Green building practices
    Value Engineering

There may be up to 5 standing offers issued for each region. Each resultant Standing Offer is for a period of three (3) years.
Architects licensed or seeking licensure (in the licesned categories), P.Eng, B. Arch (or equivalent are qualified to bid.
All interested architects are required to identify themselves into one of the on Ontario- region , under the five SOs.
Each bidder shall indicate their maximum payment value.
Select Your region below and submit your tender documentation

Region options:
a) Central Ontario
b) Southwestern Ontario 
c) Northern Ontario 
d) Southwestern Ontario

   
Please see the Buying and Scheduling Module, MS Word “ Notice” for chapters including chapter 8 and chapter 15.
